verse.roman:
tat-suto viśadas tasya
syenajit samajāyata
rucirāśvo dṛḍhahanuḥ
kāśyo vatsaś ca tat-sutāḥ

synonyms: tat-sutaḥ—the son of Jayadratha; viśadaḥ—Viśada; tasya—the son of Viśada; syenajit—Syenajit; samajāyata—was born; rucirāśvaḥ—Rucirāśva; dṛḍhahanuḥ—Dṛḍhahanu; kāśyaḥ—Kāśya; vatsaḥ—Vatsa; ca—also; tat-sutāḥ—sons of Syenajit.
translation: The son of Jayadratha was Viśada, and his son was Syenajit. The sons of Syenajit were Rucirāśva, Dṛḍhahanu, Kāśya and Vatsa.
